content.string:
[h2]Highlights[/h2] [list] [*]Added a SynTek Residential themed main menu background. [*]The camera feeds that display behind briefing have less static and are less distracting. [*]Many guns are now more accurate while crouching.[expand type=details][list][*]22A3-1 Assault Rifle [*]22A4-2 Combat Rifle [*]22A7-Z Prototype Assault Rifle [*]50CMG4-1 [*]K80 Personal Defense Weapon [*]M42 Vindicator [*]S23A SynTek Autogun [*]Model 35 Pump-action Shotgun[/list][/expand] [/list]
[h2]Mission Improvements[/h2] [list] [*][b]Deima Surface Bridge:[/b] Fixed some drone spawn locations on the bridge that resulted in stuck aliens. [*][b]Deima Surface Bridge:[/b] Improved Onslaught spawning around the end of the bridge. [*][b]Tears for Tarnor: Abandoned Maintenance Tunnels:[/b] Fixed aliens getting stuck around the laser. [*][b]Tears for Tarnor: Oasis Colony Spaceport:[/b] Fixed a xenomite spawn location in the control room that wasn't working. [*][b]Tilarus-5: Arctic Infiltration:[/b] Fixed misleading collisions around the first airlock. [*][b]Paranoia: High Tension:[/b] Fixed some instances of the ground flickering. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Platform XVII:[/b] Fixed onslaught aliens spawning in midair along the platform track. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Groundwork Labs:[/b] Fixed marines after the first eight (in special game modes with more than eight marines) getting stuck at the start. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Groundwork Labs:[/b] Fixed a performance hitch when approaching the central area in multiplayer. [*][b]Reduction: Fallen City:[/b] Fixed a fire near some eggs at the end of the mission being very slow to ignite. [/list]
